RelatedSentence: The McMillan family is selling its half stake in Auckland - based BMW , Mini and Roll Royce dealer Team McMillan to co-owner Collins Asset Management , and founder Bob McMillan will retire from the business .

The McMillan family is selling its half stake in Auckland - based BMW , Mini and Roll Royce dealer Team McMillan to co-owner Collins Asset Management , and founder Bob McMillan will retire from the business .
Collins Asset Management 's managing director Tim Cook said financial terms of the transaction , which is effective on June 30 , were confidential .
